import { useUpdateProfile } from "react-firebase-hooks/auth"; import { auth } from "../backend/firebase-config"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function UserSettings(props) { const [displayName, setDisplayName] = useState(""); const [photoURL, setPhotoURL] = useState(""); const [updateProfile, updating, error] = useUpdateProfile(auth); const photoSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await updateProfile({photoURL}) alert('Updated Profile Image') } if (error) { return (

Error: {error.message}

); } if (updating) { return

Updating...

; } return ( <>

Profile Image

photoSubmit(e)}> setPhotoURL(e.target.value)}/>

Email

); }
